channel.title: Little help, if it can be fixed
channel.description:
(So let me start by saying if this needs to got in models please advice me for next time)
anyways thanks for reading, what i need to know is, is there anyway to re-size model so they fit better? I.e armor is bigger so it doesn't show default body coming over the armor after equipping thank you for you time, :)

item.title: Little help, if it can be fixed
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If you’re saying the armor looks like this:

(Notice the face/arms)

Make sure the item is added into your item.cfg or equivalent.

Then, in Item.java add it to the appropriate list of items.
E.g: if it’s a full platebody, add it to the fullBody list.

Please remember to be descriptive and post any information about your server that may be helpful, remember, we aren’t mind readers.

Read full topic
item.source: Little help, if it can be fixed
